casebody.data:
Reuben Roy ROTHSTEIN, Appellant, v. Wm. H. HIATT, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Lewisburg, Pa. No. 9347. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Submitted April 8, 1947. Decided April 18, 1947. See also, D.C., 70 F.Supp. 867. Reuben Roy Rothstein, of Lewisburg, Pa., for appellant. Arthur A. Maguire, U. S. Atty., of Scranton, Pa., for appellee.

Before GOODRICH, McLAUGHLIN, and KALODNER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court, 68 F.Supp. 738, is affirmed.
